snippet: The marriage license of the mass murderer Charles Manson, 80, and a 26-year-old devotee is set to expire without a wedding, officials said Monday.
abstract: California officials say 90-day marriage license of mass murderer Charles Manson, 80, and a 26-year-old devotee is set to expire without a wedding.
lead_paragraph: The marriage license of the mass murderer Charles Manson, 80, and a 26-year-old devotee is set to expire without a wedding, officials said Monday.

headline.main: California: Manson Misses Window for Marriage Under 90-Day License
headline.print_headline: California: Manson Misses Window for Marriage Under 90-Day License
